It's kinda unesccesary how much they take away.

Last year I hated Spotify but they have improved a lot in the past few months. Still think it's the worst music player if you want to find new music. why do I get recommended same thing over and over and over.... they need to improve that. rest I can live with.

This app has so many flaws. 1, you can skip 6 songs every HOUR, 2, you listen to ads all the time, saying you'll enjoy 30 minutes of uninterrupted listening (you get an ad a few minutes later). We should have no ads when we use MOBILE DATA. And there's monthly use of lyrics. We can't choose songs we made on OUR OWN playlist. Like hello? Why should I pay for a regular listening experience? And why is every time I search for a song to play, it plays a different one? Overrated by the media.

The free version is great for listening to podcasts. However, I would highly recommend subscribing if you want the best music experience. Otherwise any song you want to listen to comes in a playlist, and there are a limited number of skips, so you have to wait patiently for your jam.

There's a fine line between making the free version of an app good & the paid version great, and making the free version just plain bad and the paid version basic but much better in comparison. In the search for profitability, it's obvious which side Spotify's chosen to end up on.

Spotify is getting worse day by day.... I can't even skip a song if I don't want to listen.... In other words this app is forcing us to listen the songs it just... We individually can't carry our own perspective without any premium.... Anyway I'm jst switching to different platform... Even though it has less songs... Atleast it will provide me the freedom to choose whichever song i want to play.... Very disappointed from Spotify....

Used to love Spotify. Then i started listening to white noise overnight and it's ruined my algorithm. The best feature of Spotify was getting recommendations and now, despite the hundreds of musical tracks I have, I practically only get white noise recommended to me. Contacted customer service and there's no way to undo this. Its a real shame, downloaded YouTube music today in the hopes that it's better and I can cancel Spotify. Disgusting that they don't listen to their users.

The year was 2017 when the Spotify app last worked as it should. At first I got hopeful with every update - I can't be the only one who has had the same damn queue problems with android and also desktop app (Win 10) With every update came only disappointment, and I've just about had it with this (cr)app Sometimes you'll throw a few songs to queue without a problem. More often than not problems arise and pressing play not only doesn't play the song but it skips the song that's next in queue...

It is impossible to listen to the songs because of the ads it's just too much and we can't skip songs whenever we want to seriously?? Also some random songs are coming to my Playlist like I don't want to hear it but I have to pay premium to skip? And I can't go back to the song that I listened to? Money hungry app.

I hate how everything is premium. Download songs? Permium. Play a playlist without it being randomized? Premium. Play songs with unlimited plays? Also permium! I just want to enjoy music but everything is so annoying due to the premium. You could atleast make a few features non-premium but you can barely relax listening to music with premium everywhere! What's next, the app itself not being downloadable for free? Please atleast make something non-premium for once, thank you.

It's an OK app but man. On mobile, it's terrible. Premium is expensive but literally the only way to use the app. You can't listen to a full album straight, it just gives you different songs. Shuffle doesn't even ACTUALLY shuffle, it's gives me the same things. Please make it actually USUABLE and not give me 300 ads after anything.

Spotify is my go to for listening music , podcast or anything . It is a great app but giving 2/5 stars because can't replay the previous song in the queue you just listened to ; you have to search the song individually. Plus when an Ad comes saying enjoy next 30 minutes of uninterrupted listening , I don't think it really means it coz it literally plays an advertisement after one song. There's just too much ads , 3 Ads back to back. I look forward for this issue to be fixed .

Before, they used to suggest good songs, discovering new songs, now it's terrible. Same songs again and again no new songs to discover, and the genre is completely different from what you've selected. Same ads repeating even after giving feedback not to play those. Can't select songs, can't skip, can't play a specific part. You can't enjoy music anymore.

it's a great app if u have a subscription but audio quality is not quite there yet , I mean it's decent but could be better . Please bring lossless audio and include it in the premium option don't make it an add on . Other streaming platforms include lossless within the same subscription .

Its only giving me access to two of my daily mixes. Fix this. has it that you cannot look at the songs in a playlist or album if you haven't made them, as well as no longer giving previews to the songs. Horrendous. I don't appreciate this. I understand it wants you to buy premium, but I refuse to spend money on an app that so clearly doesn't care about its user-base, paying or non-paying. I highly deter anyone from downloading.

Two major complaints by me: 1. When the ad says to "enjoy the next 30 minutes of uninterrupted music" it should be like that but I get another ad just after listening to 2 songs (which are of maximum 4 minutes). Keep up to your words! 2. The shuffle mode isn't good nowadays at all... like suppose I heard to 'song A' and then some song plays and then again 'song A' starts playing like I have a lot of songs on the playlist but no the same song has to be repeated, and I do NOT want that. Fix It!

I have been using this app for the longest time without any problems, which was up until the beginning of this year when I downloaded songs for offline listening, and the app said I should check my connection which does not make any sense, seeing as that I have premium and I've been downloading songs without this problem. Please help

Very bad user experience. Spotify is very desperate to force people to buy premium subscription. They are even taking away the basic features like playing particular song. While you are trying to play a particular song, it is popping up the purchase of premium and not letting to play song and showing to play song tomorrow. Kindly note that there are many alternative apps available on Play Store. For a user, it is easy to switch then to deal with all this nonsense.

It used to be a quality app comfortably the best to listen to music and podcasts on but in the last few months I've constantly been having issues with it. Often it won't pause or start songs even continuing to play after I shut the app down following the pause button not working, it also commonly freezes.

It's frustrating when apps we rely on become bogged down with intrusive ads. It can feel like a constant interruption, especially when you're just trying to enjoy your music. Some users have found that subscribing to the app's premium membership removes the ads, while others have explored alternative apps with fewer interruptions.

The smart shuffle feature is completely broken, it plays the exact same songs in the exact same order whenever you click play, when you have smart shuffle enabled and you select a song in your liked songs, music just stops playing. It's a really cool feauture in theory, Spotify just somehow completely botched it, it is heavily bugged and should be removed until it's fully operational. Additionally, the mixes that Spotify curates for you is also just completely random and doesn't make sense.

The app often crashes and has the same faults persist despite updates. Selecting a genre of music from liked songs, but then it doesn't form a queue with the songs. Simple updates like being able to create a playlist with selected artists would be so much better.

The algorithm could use an upgrade because it does not seem to realize that music from a particular artist is unwanted when I constantly click that artist away. It should be made easier to find a button saying, "I don't like this artist." Besides that, I love the app!

💀 I tried paying for Spotify Premium. First payment method got blocked. Second one got blocked. So did the third one. Support is absolutely useless, closing the chat saying we can't do anything. I usually like Spotify Free, but this experience made me steer clear of Spotify. I can't even give this company my money.

was previously with Apple, and moved over due to work blocking my connection. So glad they did. The app is easy to use and provides a great customer experience. Spotify unwrapped is great and something I look forward to each year and the recent addition of the AI DJ is great. 5* from me.

After trying out premium just for one day, it really changed my whole listening experience here. Turns out all I needed is just premium subscription, yes it's not free but for only IDR 54k a month? Very worth it. Also they give you 2 months for just IDR 27k in your first ever subscription, which is a very great deal! If you ever complain if there's a lot of limited options or too many ads, at least try the mini subscription (which only cost IDR 10k)!

i really love it! but maybe yall can put less adds and let ppl hear music in order. its a bit anoying having to rearrange songs one at a time just to listen to them the way you want... and I know it's the free version, but you could not make it so limited, ya'know? anyways, i lov yall! (〃^ー^〃)

I would like to say that spotify is getting worse time to time because we have to listen the most disturbing ads after every 2 or 3 songs and unlike the old spotify, they have now added the limits for the songs, after the limit is reached, we cannot choose the songs which we want to play and listen, it's the worst thing ever. My gosh... this app is something else on a negative level. Whenever i try to listen to a playlist or 1 specific song, it always gives the "recommended" songs? Gets worse and worse by time, software usability wise. Terrible app. Overrated and glazed. Press play on my music and instead of listening to the artist I played it's seven ads followed by some middle aged man telling you to do a survey. You know what? After checking out Tidal again, I have to say that—even though it offers lossless audio—nothing compares to Spotify's efficiency and convenience. While I do wish Spotify had a lossless option, I can’t help but appreciate the quality of the user experience.

When you are out of data, this app is very buggy and slow, it is so desperate to connect to the internet even if you have podcasts or songs downloaded. Terribly slow to play, it won't navigate, won't even play a song or podcast that is already halfway through from a previous session if you open without internet.

Randomly shutting down; inconsistent way of adding songs to queue; can't remove individual songs from queue; doesn't load without internet; some blends never refresh; useless features get added and app keeps getting more bloated (videos, editor picks, local top hits. Why?); cannot search for facebook friends; setting "Do not play" on author prevents me from playing them even when I go to their profile myself. Would appreciate a way to discover songs from authors I already liked.

Finally, after years of use with and without premium, now its time to say good bye to Spotify. Their greed is too high. First ads, then no skips, no shuffles or queues and Now I cant even play the song I want without paying. Its about such culture of malpractices that further discourages me from paying. Please don't fool people by stating this app as free. This is a fully paid app now. Time to switch to youtube or something else for better environment.

The new update to this app is very disappointing. Almost everything needs premium subscription like can't we even listen to the song we want to from any part?? To many adds, play the same songs over and over even if you just stop the app for 10 minutes it will play the same songs just played😥. In saying all that I still love this for all the music choice and easy setup for different play lists and great sound quality.

I paid for premium, thats already too much to be honest but if I'm paying for something I expect it to genuinely work but no it doesn't. I listen to music and suddenly the music just stops and I have to go in the app again to start the song from the beginning again. Its annoying.

Not worth it. It has a great selection of music, but basic functions cost money for premium. You only get a few skips an hour, and they say you get 30 minutes of no ads - just to get an ad in the next one or two songs. 90% ads and 10% music unless you pay them.

This app is very cool and I love listening to music,but the think I hate is that after a while,this dosent let you play the songs you want and forces you to listen the recommendations EVEN THOUGH WE DONT WANT TO! paying every month just for it to not work anymore.all my liked songs are gone,i have to wait 2 minutes for a song to start playing and it's crashing constantly.do not even know where this came from. uninstalled and installed the app again again,nothing worked. rebooted my phone a million times,still not working. this month i still payed, praying for it to work normally again.i was very wrong.

if your looking for the best experience it's better to pay but if you don't have enough money or your a minor you can use the free version but it'll be annoying like ads popping up and when you play a song sometimes it plays another song before the one you wanted and same goes to downloading songs you need to pay but overall this app is actually amazing for music i recommend paying for premium for the best experience if i even buy premium I'll change my ratings to 5 stars
